com.console

Class OXGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.console.OXGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OXGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class will play the Tic-Tac-Toe game,
    There are 2 way to play the game:
    1. You can player by using OXGame(Board, Player...) - this will allow you to play the game in console.
    2. Another way is OXGame(InputStream, Board, Player...) - this will allow you to play the game with any input stream that you wanted.

    To run the game just call method run()

    Since:
    2/23/2017 AD.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    bubblebitoey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OXGame(Board board, Player... players)
      use default input stream to player the game that allow you to playing the game in console like terminal or compiler
      To setting the game you must have The board and The player.
      OXGame(java.io.InputStream s, Board board, Player... players)
      this constructor will use optional InputStream as parameter that allow you to pass any input stream that you want inside the game.

      • OXGame

        public OXGame(Board board,
              Player... players)
        use default input stream to player the game that allow you to playing the game in console like terminal or compiler

      • OXGame

        public OXGame(java.io.InputStream s,
              Board board,
              Player... players)
        this constructor will use optional InputStream as parameter that allow you to pass any input stream that you want inside the game.
        Parameters:
        s - any input stream type (like file, web, etc.).
        board - the game board.
        players - the game players.
